item.title: [linker error]
item.dc:creator: @Jython super_
item.description:
@Jython wrote:

add allegro’s static library to the linker arguments…
dump dev-c++ while you’re at it, it’s an old, poor IDE with a very outdated copy of mingw

Read full topic

item.title: [linker error]
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

that’s not the issue because i have made a small one where all it was, was a 400 x 400 window and an @ sign and it worked, but 1st time i had an linker eror like this , but didn’t know how i fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: [linker error]
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Make sure you have allegro added to the linker’s additional libraries

Read full topic

item.title: [linker error]
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

#include <allegro.h>

int x = 10;
int y = 10;

int main() {

allegro_init();
install_keyboard();
set_gfx_mode( GFX_AUTODETECT, 640, 480, 0, 0);
              while ( !key[KEY_ESC] ){
                    
                    clear_keybuf();

acquire_screen();

textout_ex( screen, font," ", x, y, makecol( 0, 0, 0), makecol( 0, 0, 0) );

if (key[KEY_UP]) --y;
else if (key[KEY_DOWN]) ++y;
else if (key[KEY_RIGHT]) ++x;
else if (key[KEY_LEFT]) --x;

textout_ex( screen, font, "0-<", x, y, makecol( 0, 0, 0), makecol (0, 0, 0) );

clear_to_color( screen, makecol( 255, 255, 255));

putpixel( screen, 5, 5, makecol( 128, 200, 23));

circle( screen, 20, 20, 10, makecol( 255, 0, 0));
circlefill( screen, 50, 50, 25, makecol( 0,255, 0));

rect( screen, 70, 70, 90, 90, makecol (0, 0, 255));
rectfill( screen, 100, 100, 120, 120, makecol( 12, 34, 200));

line( screen, 130, 130, 150, 150, makecol( 255, 0, 0));
line( screen, 130, 130, 170, 130, makecol( 255, 0, 0));
line( screen, 170, 130, 150, 150, makecol( 255, 0, 0));

floodfill( screen, 140, 135, makecol( 255, 255, 0));

triangle (screen, 200, 200, 200, 220, 220, 210, makecol(213, 79, 40));

release_screen();

rest(50);

}

readkey();

return 0;

}
END_OF_MAIN();

[Linker error] undefined reference to _install_allegro_version_check' [Linker error] undefined reference toinstall_keyboard’
[Linker error] undefined reference to set_gfx_mode' [Linker error] undefined reference to_imp__key’
[Linker error] undefined reference to clear_keybuf' [Linker error] undefined reference tomakecol’
[Linker error] undefined reference to makecol' [Linker error] undefined reference to_imp__font’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__screen' [Linker error] undefined reference totextout_ex’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__key' [Linker error] undefined reference to_imp__key’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__key' [Linker error] undefined reference to_imp__key’
[Linker error] undefined reference to makecol' [Linker error] undefined reference tomakecol’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__font' [Linker error] undefined reference to_imp__screen’
[Linker error] undefined reference to textout_ex' [Linker error] undefined reference tomakecol’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__screen' [Linker error] undefined reference tomakecol’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__screen' [Linker error] undefined reference tomakecol’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__screen' [Linker error] undefined reference tomakecol’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__screen' [Linker error] undefined reference tomakecol’
[Linker error] undefined reference to _imp__screen' [Linker error] undefined reference tomakecol’
